summary: The diff implements REQ-17 by adding a custom domain configuration interface (CustomDomainPage.tsx) accessible via /admin/custom-domain route, with navigation integrated in NavBar and AdminDashboard. The page provides documentation and UI elements guiding users through DNS configuration steps, displays canister ID and current URL, and includes instructions for domain registration, DNS setup, Internet Identity authentication considerations, and verification steps. All acceptance criteria for REQ-17 appear to be satisfied.
